headline: Did Autodesk's (ADSK) Team USA Olympic Campaign Just Redefine Its Sustainability Investment Narrative?
summary: In late October 2025, Autodesk launched its first-ever Team USA campaign, marking 100 days until the Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympic and Paralympic Games and highlighting its role as the Official Design and Make Platform for the LA28 Olympic and Paralympic Games and Team USA. This campaign underscores Autodesk’s commitment to innovation and sustainability in design, linking its technology platform with the spirit of achieving excellence through engineering, creativity, and...
